alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Montour; Northumberland (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 5:30PM EDT until July 24 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Columbia County in central Pennsylvania... Montour County in central Pennsylvania... Northwestern Northumberland County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 530 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Lovelton to Central to R.B. Winter State Park, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Milton, Watsontown, New Columbia, Montandon, Jerseytown, Rohrsburg, Iola, Jamison City, Eyers Grove, Waller, Central and Exchange. For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the Lewisburg-Williamsport and Buckhorn exits, specifically between mile markers 211 and 222, and near mile marker 224. This includes Interstate 180 from mile markers 1 to 8. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
